features: 🌳GENTLE TO THE EARTH: HOPE BABY eco-friendly baby wipes help reduce the amount of plastic waste we send to landfills, effectively reducing the human impact on the environment.

🌳GENTLE ON BABY'S SKIN: HOPE BABY wet wipes are free of alcohol, fragrance, and harsh chemicals. Our unscented baby wipes are infused with 99% pure water, pH balanced and contain aloe vera and vitamin E to gently wipe the delicate skin of newborns. They can also be used safely by babies with sensitive skin.

🌳THICK AND SOFT: HOPE BABY diaper wipes are made of soft non-woven material that can be used to wipe your baby's body, hands and buttocks. They do not cause additional damage to the skin and also allow for better body cleaning. It is the perfect partner for parents when changing their baby's diaper, throw it in the trash after use and DO NOT FLUSH.

🌳NOTE WORTHY: Wet wipes need to be re-covered with a stick-on lid after use and stored at room temperature. To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep baby wipes and plastic bags away from babies, children and pets. For external use only.

productInformation.value: #20,608 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #170 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Large wipes and great pleasant scent. Didn’t irritate my toddlers skin and cleaned up well! I also used them as makeup remover wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kind of a strong scent; soft wipes
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are nice and soft, and while they do the job, are not quite unscented like the listing claims. The scent is fine, but not really typical of baby wipes. It's a little too strong and fruity of a smell for me. The wipes themselves are robust and stretchy which is nice, and the packaging they come in is robust. All in all, a decent value, but not the best scent ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT USE ON BABY. HEAVILY PERFUMED
reviews.reviewText: DONT USE AS BABY WIPE. A LOT OF PERFUME. NOT NATURAL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cheaper alternative to Brands at Drug Stores
reviews.reviewText: This Sensitive baby wipes is a perfect and cost effective alternative to the 2 big name brands that you are forced to buy at Drug Stores and other grocery stores that cost the same, but only half (or even sometimes 1/3) of the product. This product has great value, has the same softness, is slightly thicker, has more wipes per pack, and is overall just as good as the brand at a fraction of the cost. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for Sensitive Wipes who want to save a little extra money on other important purchases like Formula or baby food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job, but not sure about the scent
reviews.reviewText: A standard set of wipes that will take care of what you need them to, with a reasonable level of dampness. They are on the stretchier side, which isn't a bad thing.The scent is throwing me off a bit. It will definitely fight any unsavory scents that you're cleaning up, and to that end, it is very effective. However, the scent itself is reminiscent of the perfume that is used by an elder generation, perhaps a little more on the tropical side. I've seen a lot of wipes get the smell right (fresh, clean, and doesn't stick around for too long), and this doesn't quite meet that standard - it will smell like you just hugged your grandma for a couple of hours after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pack of baby wipes was nice and plump. Each sheet was nicely coated with liquid and definitely on the damper side. Wiping my babies bottom wasn't a pleasant experience but that wasn't because of these wipes. The experience of wiping just isn't pleasant. The wipes did their job - they just have a very strong scent which I do not necessarily enjoy since it spreads right when you take it out of the bag. It's quite overwhelming and though it's a very familiar baby powder scent, it isn't something I want to be breathing in or spreading around what I use it on. Besides the strong smell, they are great wipes and I know I will be completing the pack in no time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong wipes, strong seal on the lid
reviews.reviewText: I noted a strong "snap" of the lid as this is a pet-peeve of mine for any products like these. This is lid gives a good "snap" to prevent the wipes from drying out. That said, the wipes are strong and hold up well. I think the scent - though I like it - might be annoying when there's a "big" mess. The combination might be unpleasant for some...but then, a "big" mess is unpleasant to begin with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not unscented but lightly perfumed
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed about these wipes was the smell. It has that class old school baby wipe smell. It was off putting at first but now it doesn't bother me since I'm used to it and expect it. The wipes itself work fine, they remind me of the Rico brand from Costco, except these have a smell to them. Would I pay $6 for these? Never. Maybe $2, they're just okay, not as good as Huggies or Pampers, but equivalent to maybe Kirkland wipes.
